title: Soudal supposedly to sponsor Deceuninck-Quick Step in 2023
content:
Soudal, the long time sponsor of Lotto Soudal, is rumoured to be parting ways with the Belgian team at the end of 2022. They will apparently join Deceuninck-Quick Step as a title sponsor for the 2023 season.

An adhesive manufacturer brand, Soudal will back Deceuninck-Quick Stepâ€™s big plans for 2023. Julian Alaphilippe, Kasper Asgreen, and Remco Evenepoel are among the six riders already signed to the Deceuninck-Quick Step team for 2023. Evenepoel will remain on the Belgian team through 2026.

This story is ongoing.
author: Abby Mickey
